akas: O Colégio da Lagoa Negra Portugal
akas from release info: O Colégio da Lagoa Negra Portugal

1.title: El protocolo
1.plot: With the virus loosed, soldiers cutting off the school, and a makeshift infirmary established to corral those infected, Evelyn decides to fake the illness to make Lucas jealous.

2.title: La amenaza
2.plot: Soldiers deliver four infected outsiders to stay at the boarding school, including Clara and a psychopath.

3.title: El hombre misterioso
3.plot: As Garrido heads the excavation of the cave-in, a petty thief emerges among the students, and the bald man from Marcos' dream visits other dreamers as well.

4.title: El tesoro
4.plot: Gullible girls prospect the tunnels for pirate plunder, mistrust abounds, sabotage strikes again, and a smuggled gun only creates new troubles within the infirmary.

5.title: El centro de la tierra
5.plot: With Lucia in need of emergency surgery, Martin hides infected Lucas in the secret loft, Evelyn seeks erotic passion, and the teens seek the scarred bald man of their dreams.

6.title: Los tres pétalos
6.plot: The dig continues; the medicine runs low. Diluting what remains by half seems the best option. As Curro begins groundwork for an insurrection, Evelyn's decision to divorce Lucas leads to a breech.

7.title: El asesino de Carolina
7.plot: As the medicine runs out and a fresh murder comes to light, trouble brews in the infirmary, and the teens await the promised reveal of Carolina's killer.

8.title: El último deseo
8.plot: Taking over the infirmary, Curro gives the school one hour to bring medication or else they'll break out; unfortunately, the staff comes to realize they've been misdirected to uncover the wrong cache.

9.title: El principio del fin
9.plot:

1.title: Los monstruos no hacen cosquillas
1.plot: A new year at the Black Lagoon Boarding School starts, one that will be full of unexpected twists and turns.

2.title: Todo el mundo tiene un secreto
2.plot: Fired, Maria finds aid, the girls recognize Alfonso's ring on Marcos' finger, and Elsa gives Héctor the silent treatment for deciding on his own to expel Iván.

3.title: Ojos que no ven
3.plot: Marcos improves his standing among Ivan's group when he discovers a secret passage which, lyin' beyond the wardrobe of the mysteriously absent Alfonso, opens into a new world of questions.

4.title: Un mensaje en una botella
4.plot: Carolina and friends break through the sealed door to find a maze of tunnels and a horrifying sight apparently awaiting them. Paula continues her friendship with the gnome.

5.title: Un cadáver en La Laguna
5.plot: An accident where a student gets hurt puts teacher Amelia's future at the school in question. Paula and Evelyn believe they've uncovered the identity of the Tooth Fairy.

6.title: La noche de Santa Isabel
6.plot: The school mystery takes a backseat to a series of relationship problems, culminating in an announcement of a dead student in the woods.

1.title: ¿Con qué sueñan los peces?
1.plot: One student dead, another student missing, and the kids get framed when the headmaster's search turns up ecstasy among their possessions.

2.title: Persiguiendo luciérnagas
2.plot: The school board offers Héctor's job to Elsa but only if she'll expel the students who were found with ecstasy among their possessions. She asks for one concession - that one can stay. Héctor objects.

3.title: El anillo
3.plot: Jacinta returns, but everyone's general happiness remains short-lived under Elsa's rule, and Marcos discovers a worrisome numerical connection between the dead orphans and his sister.

4.title: La caja de música
4.plot: Elsa's ignorance of Julia's home life could cost her her career as head mistress. Fermin's inability to hide a serious injury could cost him his life.

5.title: En orden alfabético
5.plot: Seeking to distance himself and Paula from the menacing school, Marcos readies to sign Héctor off as their guardian, but two investigations lead him to an impasse with no one to trust.

6.title: Ver para creer
6.plot: To prove they're not related and can be together, Iván's cousin, Manuela Portillo, sends him an unexpected item - his own death certificate.

7.title: Mi amigo el monstruo
7.plot: With police on hand to investigate the whereabouts of a missing person, existence of the gnome becomes public. Will the lesson of judging a book by its cover intercede before tragedy strikes?

8.title: El polo norte
8.plot: Christmas approaches and all but Marcos, Paula and Miguel pack for home. An unexpected snowstorm sets in, upsetting plans for some while revealing a hero and a traitor.

1.title: El búho
1.plot: Repeat visits from an owl convince Paula in the gnome's reincarnation, Iván can't believe he killed a man, Fermin fights for his life while losing the paintings, the gang discovers a second door, and Saúl preps a new operative.

2.title: 8 milímetros
2.plot: Nora impresses Héctor with keen powers of observation, but Fermin's expertise in forensics reveals a nearly 6' assailant shooting his nameless contact with Maria in the room. Her behavior points to Iván.

3.title: El soldadito de plomo
3.plot: Tired of being too passive, Marcos and Iván make bold moves, which Paula and Evelyn unknowingly undermined when seeing nothing but constant lies and deceit in everyone older than themselves.

4.title: En el fondo del mar
4.plot: As the gang seeks information on the school's connection to Cristina Palacios Rodríguez, all but Iván encourage Paula to forgive Javier for decapitating Lola.

5.title: La vida es sueño
5.plot: With plumbing problems plaguing the school, Paula questions reality after repeatedly awakening inside a hospital. Marcos learns a horrifying fact about his parents' disappearance. Jacinta and Joaquin strike a deal.

6.title: La peor cárcel del mundo
6.plot: An injured owl leads Paula to consider the value of being free, thereby risking death, against the safety and boredom of living in a cage - a lesson lived out by others at the boarding school.

7.title: El fantasma de la profesora decapitada
7.plot: Marcos' secret relationship becomes less secret, Julia heeds Paula when she says that ghosts appear when they have something important to convey, and Mateo experiences horror.

8.title: Los cinco vengadores
8.plot: A note discovered at the abandoned playground of the old orphanage reveals the names of "The Five Avengers" plus a sixth who survived.

9.title: La noche del fuego
9.plot: As the school prepares for its annual bonfire (where flames wait to accept wishes and purge bad memories), two teachers face death, one teacher faces expulsion, a student remains ostracized, and a prisoner escapes.

1.title: La maldición
1.plot: Martin and Lucas are getting used to living in the boarding school. Fermin is looking for Irene's baby. Hector has decided to sell one of the diamonds he found in the cave. Lucas makes friends with Paula and Evelyn.

2.title: La sala del tesoro
2.plot: As Saúl appears abruptly before Marcos to advise him towards identify the bodies in the morgue as his parents, Fermin discovers a treasure trove in the labyrinth, and Elsa cares for Baby Samuel in secret.

3.title: El secreto mejor guardado
3.plot: Marcos, Lucas and Héctor consider sharing their best kept secrets (which would all be best if kept secret).

4.title: Premonición
4.plot: With the threat of death looming as he continues to pursue information about his missing mother, Marcos takes an extreme course of action to make a hospital connection that won't arouse suspicion.

5.title: El exorcismo
5.plot: Miguel convinces Paula and Lucas that Evelyn's sleepwalking comes from demonic possession. He highly recommends an exorcism in which water balloons figure predominantly.

6.title: Escrito en las estrellas
6.plot: Lieutenant Jimeno visits the school to investigate the death of Mateo Tabuenca, whose decaying corpse policemen found in the trunk of a teacher's car.

7.title: Un gran soldado
7.plot: As the school remains a hot focal point of multiple mysteries and intrigue, Iván signs the papers acknowledging Jacques as his father, almost immediately aware of its depths as a bad move.

8.title: La llave
8.plot: As more connections come to light between those at the school, Elsa awaits word on baby Samuel while Paula and Eveyln strive to prevent Jacinta's death.

9.title: El unicornio
9.plot: Martín hopes the incredible nature of Lucas's latest prophetic dream (where Camilo collides with a flying unicorn) will prove them all insubstantial. Meanwhile, Julia sets out for her father's safety deposit box alone.

10.title: Un punto en el mar
10.plot: As the kids try again to undermine the murder dream, the gang deciphers the last book clue, the school elects a new principal, Julia leaves for good with her step-father, and Fermín's search for his father's killer pays off.

11.title: La noche de las dos lunas
11.plot: As the school celebrates its Night of the Twin Moons, several people put themselves in harm's way for the sake of another, and an unwary child playing sheriff roams the halls with a real gun.

1.title: El cuaderno del Doctor Wulf
1.plot: Rebeca makes a bad first impression with Martin; Roque, Carolina and Vicky are lured into the woods and the police search for Elsa's father.

2.title: Amnesia
2.plot: Amelia's gun and Javier's slingshot prompt Paula to start a private anti-violence campaign, confiscating and disposing of all weaponry at the school.

3.title: El hombre del saco
3.plot: Thanks to Jacques' insensitivity, Paula and Evelyn believe the bogeyman has devoured baby Samuel and they must somehow break the news to Elsa.

4.title: La novia cadáver
4.plot: Noiret continues to look for the papers missing from his safe. Lucas has another dream. Marcos realizes who the baby really is. Another student dies.

5.title: La promesa
5.plot: Don Joaquin's body is found. More details about Rebeca's past are shown. Paula and Evelyn try to win back Jacinta. Marcos and Carolina get into more trouble. Julia finds out who her ghost is. Ivan turns in his father.

6.title: El vampiro
6.plot: Paula and Evelyn find a bat and think it's Camilo. Marcos and his friends explore the lab in the passages. Hector and Jacinto piece together more of the Gemini Project.

7.title: El rey de la baraja
7.plot: Two days till the end of term and escape from the boarding school horrors, but with an unnamed student scheduled for death, Marcos' group wonders who it might be.

8.title: Paula en el país de las maravillas
8.plot: Appearing as Alice in a school production of Alice in Wonderland, Paula questions the condition of madness - perception or dysfunction - and believes Julia needs help.

9.title: El último día
9.plot: End of term. Summer vacation. Statements of farewell with hopes to leave forever, and others' plans to counter those plans. Many secrets finally revealed, and new developments arise.

1.title: Los monstruos vienen de noche
1.plot: A new school term begins with Martin as Academic Director, the investigative teens brought to heel through infection, and a monster in the surrounding woods.

2.title: Las galletas del porvenir
2.plot: As the teen gang renews their friendships, fortune cookie fortunes within Paula's group come to pass - leading up to the dire forecast for Evelyn.

3.title: El hombre lobo
3.plot: Both Maria and Lucas find themselves disbelieved, one for claiming the birth of a son and having her life threatened, the other for reporting a werewolf in the woods that infiltrates the school by night.

4.title: La traición
4.plot: A mix-up in bottles exposes the fact of a mole among the teens, but it also leaves Ivan without his daily dosage. As Jacques and Hugo seek the identity of the invasive killer creature, Lucas lays hands on Jacques' cash.

5.title: El baile de los culpables
5.plot: At the school's Feast of Saint Isabel, as Jacques continues to deprive Ivan of medication, Ivan, rather than give up Maria, aims literally to take his dad down during the festivities and expire together.

6.title: Paula y el lobo
6.plot: Hugo begins to understand the wolf man in the woods, Jacques finds his authority undermined, and the teens help Julia face the powerful Paula-like girl ghost.

7.title: La leyenda de Eva
7.plot: As knowledge is power, factions play a three-sided chess game (figuratively) for more. Evelyn, meanwhile, fears she's pregnant, while Carolina seeks the identity of the mole.

8.title: La princesa de hielo
8.plot: Carolina's disappearance freaks out her friends as different stories roll in about her sudden departure. They're sure of one thing - Jacques is behind it.

9.title: El extraterrestre
9.plot: As Marcos mourns the loss of Carolina, Rebeca recruits Maria into a dangerous plan, much against Fermin's wishes, and Martin encounters a familiar face he's never met.

10.title: La habitación número 13
10.plot: Eva's clue leads the teens to discover a sealed bedroom, Fermin fumes over Rebeca getting Maria more deeply involved in intrigue, and the kids hope to get Jacinta "laid."

11.title: El mago
11.plot: With only two factions aware, a countdown barrels toward the activation of lethal biological bombs loosed upon world society. Meanwhile, the kids find Hugo to be magical.

12.title: Alaska
12.plot: The wrong determination on which twin survived the night, Hugo or Daniel, could cost lives. Meanwhile, as Marcos works to remove Paula from school, Elsa threatens to blow Alicia's cover if her demand for justice isn't met.

13.title: Después de la luz
13.plot: Evelyn, mistaking Daniel's vial of the death virus as a cologne sample from Paris, intends to make it a gift for Lucas' birthday.

imdb.title: The Boarding School
plot: Students at a boarding school find that the school is full of mysteries and secrets.::Brandon Rastello
